items.title: Why Johnson & Johnson (JNJ) is the Best Pharma Stock to Buy According to Hedge Funds
items.description: We recently published a list of the 11 Best Pharma Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) stands against the other best pharma stocks to buy according to hedge funds.
